name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
schedule:
WK	Date	Topic
1	Sep 16	Introduction
2	Sep 23	Unit1 Beauty
3	Sep 30	Unit 1 Beauty
4	Oct 7	Unit 2 Shelter for street people
5	Oct 14	Unit 2 Shelter for street people
6	Oct 21	Unit 3 A rainbow effect
7	Oct 28	Unit 3 A rainbow effect
8	Nov 4	Review
9	Nov 11 	Mid-term
10	Nov 18	Unit 4 Attached to crime
11	Nov 25	Unit 4 Attached to crime
12	Dec 2	Unit 5 Old lifestyle
12	Dec 9	Unit 5 Old lifestyle
14	Dec 16	Unit 6 The bible hospital
15	Dec 23	Unit 6 The bible hospital
16	Dec 30	Unit 7 The Baby beeper
17	Jan 6	Final 
18	Jan 13	Final
scorePolicy:
50% In-class participation, performance and presentation
20% mid-term exam
30% final exam
materials: Numrich, Carol.(2007). Face the Issue. New York: Pearson
